scripts.build-docs: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 --importer importer.js docs/style.scss docs/style.css
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch scss --ignore dist/ -e scss -x "npm run build"
scripts.build-font: icon-font-generator icons/*.svg -o ./docs -p ncicons --types ttf --normalize -n ncicons --height 600 | node-sass --output-style compressed --precision 6 --importer importer ./docs/ncicons.css ./dist/ncicons.min.css | cp ./docs/ncicons.ttf ./dist/ncicons.ttf
